name: places/ChIJHfzV1vhYwokR_uJWFtYK-ZM
formattedAddress: 61 W 49th St, New York, NY 10112, USA
adrFormatAddress: 61 W 49th St, New York, NY 10112, USA

editorialSummary.text: This upscale retailer with handcrafted leather shoes & accessories also sells apparel.

originalText.text:
We were looking for a dress shoe for our wedding, so glad we came to this store! You can see the craftsmanship and quality from the first sight, not to mention they also offer their shoes in 8 different widths!

Alex was super friendly and patient, he assisted my fiancé tried all the possible options to help us find the perfect look and fit. We were so happy with our decisions! Thank you!

text.text:
We were looking for a dress shoe for our wedding, so glad we came to this store! You can see the craftsmanship and quality from the first sight, not to mention they also offer their shoes in 8 different widths!

Alex was super friendly and patient, he assisted my fiancé tried all the possible options to help us find the perfect look and fit. We were so happy with our decisions! Thank you!

originalText.text:
I would avoid this store. I went here with a friend and was fitted by Kam Taherpour. My friend and I purchased 3 pairs of shoes total (I got 2 my friend got 1), ordering for delivery since the right colors or shoe models weren't in stock. In the end, none of the three shoes fit.

I went to a different store and got one shoe swapped out for a different size. My friend just had to return his because they were too big. For my second pair, Kam convinced me they'd break in but after walking for 5 blocks my feet were bleeding and overall they felt way too small. When I went back and spoke to Kam again, he wouldn't consider swapping for another size or model because they're now "worn" which is a bit deceptive. Unfortunately his tactics worked and I'm now stuck with expensive shoes I can't wear.

I would recommend the one on 55th, it's close by so no reason to waste your time here. I've had much better service at that location. Be careful for the bait and switch from the sales people here.

originalText.text: I was lucky enough to be part of the AE 100 campaign and yet bias aside, my shopping experience was exceptional. I was attended to swiftly and extensively. He measured my shoe size and offered options. It was a charming experience. If you’re looking to invest in a high end shoe brand, this is the one.

text.text: I was lucky enough to be part of the AE 100 campaign and yet bias aside, my shopping experience was exceptional. I was attended to swiftly and extensively. He measured my shoe size and offered options. It was a charming experience. If you’re looking to invest in a high end shoe brand, this is the one.

originalText.text: Fantastic service, very professional, and courteous. I visited this location, and although they didn't carry the model I was looking for, the sales associate (please excuse that I don't remember his name), but he took it upon himself to check all other stores' inventory, and even called them to direct me to the right place. Outstanding service, very professional and kudos for going the extra mile for your customers! Fantastic experience, and highly recommended.

originalText.text:
Michael needs to be cloned and sent around the country to every shoe store. But he is unique and his exceptional knowledge and experience is what makes people come back to this specific Allen Edmonds store again and again.
The products are very good quality and would likely last a very long time if you follow Michael's advice for care.
Allen Edmonds offer a service to re-skin the shoes and bring them back to New.
